Package com.ibm.rest

Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.rest.MovieController
@CrossOrigin @RestController public class MovieController extends Object
REST controller for handling Movie-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • addMovie

      @PostMapping(path="/admin/movie/add", consumes="multipart/form-data") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> addMovie(@RequestParam("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image, @RequestParam("movie") String ms) throws MovieAlreadyExistException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      End point for adding a new movie with an image. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/movie/add
      Parameters:
      image - the image file of the movie
      ms - the JSON representation of the movie object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the success message or error
      Throws:
      MovieAlreadyExistException - if the movie already exists
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if there is an error mapping JSON to movie object
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if there is an error processing JSON

    • updateMovie

      @PutMapping(path="/admin/movie/update", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateMovie(@RequestBody Movie m) throws MovieNotFoundException
      End point for updating an existing movie. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/movie/update
      Parameters:
      m - the updated movie object
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the success message or error
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie is not found

    • getAllMovies

      @GetMapping(path="/movie/all", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Movie>> getAllMovies()
      End point for retrieving all movies. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/movie/all
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of movies

    • getMovieById

      @GetMapping(path="/movie/search/id/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Movie> getMovieById(@PathVariable int id) throws MovieNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a movie by its ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/movie/search/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the movie
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the movie
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie is not found

    • getMovieByName

      @GetMapping(path="/movie/search/name/{name}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Movie> getMovieByName(@PathVariable String name) throws MovieNotFoundException
      End point for retrieving a movie by its name. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/movie/search/all/{all}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the movie
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the movie
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie is not found

    • removeMovieById

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/movie/remove/id/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeMovieById(@PathVariable int id) throws MovieNotFoundException
      End point for removing a movie by its ID. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/movie/remove/id/{id}
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the movie to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the success message or error
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie is not found

    • removeMovieByName

      @DeleteMapping(path="/admin/movie/remove/name/{name}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> removeMovieByName(@PathVariable String name) throws MovieNotFoundException
      End point for removing a movie by its name. Example URL: http://localhost:8880/admin/movie/remove/name/{name}
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the movie to remove
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the success message or error
      Throws:
      MovieNotFoundException - if the movie is not found
